g++   -fpermissive -std=c++0x -Wall -O3 -lm -DNSDEBUG   CMakeFiles/microBench.dir/microBenchLauncher.cpp.o  -o microBench  -L/lib64/libhwloc.so -rdynamic ../src/runtime/libdarts.a libCDSerial.a libCDParallel.a libCDSourceSinc.a libTPParllel.a libTPSerial.a libTPStrict.a libTPNonStrict.a libTPCDOverhead.a libInit.a libParallelLoop.a libSerialLoop.a libCodeletLoop.a ../src/abstractmachine/libamm.a -lhwloc ../src/rsmanager/librsmanager.a ../src/common/libcommon.a -lpthread ../src/threading/libcodelet.a ../src/scheduler/libscheduler.a ../src/threadlocal/libthreadlocal.a -lrt -ltbb -Wl,-rpath,/lib64/libhwloc.so
